submittedOn.description: The date the other employment income was added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

items.description: Financial details about share options income.

employerRef.description: A reference number given to every business that registers with HMRC as an employer.

schemePlanType.description: The type of share scheme or plan the employer has: Enterprise Management Incentive (EMI), Company Share Option Plan (CSOP) or Save As You Earn (SAYE).

dateOfOptionGrant.description: The date the option was granted in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

dateOfEvent.description: The date the event occurred in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

optionNotExercisedButConsiderationReceiv.description: Boolean option not exercised but consideration received for lapse, release or assignment of the option.

amountOfConsiderationReceived.description: The amount of consideration received. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

noOfSharesAcquired.description: The number of shares acquired. The value must be 0 or more.

classOfSharesAcquired.description: The class type of shares acquired.

exercisePrice.description: The price per share at which the owner of a traded option is entitled to buy or sell. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amountPaidForOption.description: The amount that an investor paid for an option contract. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

marketValueOfSharesOnExcise.description: The price that a stock can be readily bought or sold in the current market place. The 'going price' of a share of stock. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

profitOnOptionExercised.description: The sum that an investor earns by buying a call option or selling a put option at maturity. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

employersNicPaid.description: The amount of National Insurance contributions the employers paid on an option. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableAmount.description: The taxable amount not subject to PAYE. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: Financial details about shares awarded or received income

employerRef.description: A reference number given to every business that registers with HMRC as an employer.

schemePlanType.description: The type of share scheme or plan the employer has.

dateSharesCeasedToBeSubjectToPlan.description: The date the shares ceased in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

noOfShareSecuritiesAwarded.description: The number of shares awarded. The value must be 0 or more.

classOfShareAwarded.description: The level of voting rights shareholders receive.

dateSharesAwarded.description: The date the shares ceased in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

sharesSubjectToRestrictions.description: The shares of a company are not fully transferable from the issuing company to the person receiving them until certain conditions have been met.

electionEnteredIgnoreRestrictions.description: A boolean indicating that the election has been made to ignore one or more restrictions, but leaving one or more restrictions to be taken into account.

actualMarketValueOfSharesOnAward.description: The market value of the shares awarded. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

unrestrictedMarketValueOfSharesOnAward.description: The unrestricted market value of the shares awarded. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amountPaidForSharesOnAward.description: The amount paid for the shares awarded. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

marketValueAfterRestrictionsLifted.description: The market value of the shares after restrictions lifted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableAmount.description: The taxable amount not subject to PAYE. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

disability.description: An object that holds the key value for disability deductions.

amountDeducted.description: The claim for an exemption for specific payments received for physical or mental impairment, when the employment ended or terms changed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignService.description: An object that holds the key value for foreign service deductions.

customerReference.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the foreign income.

amountDeducted.description: Amount of post-employment notice pay that is not taxable in the UK because it is taxable overseas. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: An array that holds details of lump sum income

employerRef.description: A reference number given to every business that registers with HMRC as an employer.

taxableLumpSumsAndCertainIncome.description: An object that holds the key value for taxable lump sums and certain income

amount.description: The amount of the taxable lump sum. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on the lump sum. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxTakenOffInEmployment.description: A boolean indicating whether tax has been taken off in employment.

benefitFromEmployerFinancedRetirementSch.description: An object that holds the key value for benefits from employer financed retirement scheme

amount.description: The amount of the benefit received. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

exemptAmount.description: The amount of benefit exempt from tax. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on the benefit. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxTakenOffInEmployment.description: A boolean indicating whether tax has been taken off in employment.

redundancyCompensationPaymentsOverExempt.description: An object that holds the key value for redundancy compensation payments over exemption

amount.description: The amount of the redundancy compensation payment over exemption. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on the redundancy compensation payments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxTakenOffInEmployment.description: A boolean indicating whether tax has been taken off in employment.

redundancyCompensationPaymentsUnderExemp.description: An object that holds the key value for redundancy compensation payments under exemption

amount.description: The amount of the redundancy compensation payments under exemption. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
